oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard photograph of Fred Walker Abel, Co. F, 322nd Inf. Regt., 81st Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Real photograph postcard of Fred Abel wearing the uniform of a U.S. Army enlisted man. The studio portrait shows Fred waist up and seated. Beatty's [Beltty's?] Studio logo embossed in lower right corner. Fred served in Co. F, 322nd Inf. Regt., 81st Div. He and his family were lifelong farmers in Rhea County, Tennessee. The 322nd Inf. Regt., 81st (Wild Cat) Div. was in reserve at the Second Battle of the Somme in the summer of 1918.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Abel, Fred
